detail_desc: Top in soft, printed jersey with a narrow trim around the neckline, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, V-neck dress with a wrapover front, short flounced sleeves, a concealed fastening at the top and seam with a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Coat in felted fabric containing some wool with a stand-up collar, concealed press-studs down the front, side pockets and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Long-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey.
Jumper in a textured cotton knit with long sleeves, a roll-edge chest pocket and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Body in soft microfibre with a slightly deeper neckline at the back and folded, glued edges for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin and minimal visibility under clothes. High cut at the back.
Shorts in soft cotton jersey with elastication and a decorative bow at the waist, and front pockets.
Long-sleeved top in cotton piqué with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Velour-covered hair elastic.
High-waisted skirt in a sturdy jacquard knit containing some wool with a covered, rib-knit waistband and a slit at the back.
Short dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and short cap sleeves. Unlined.
Trousers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.

Padded jacket in woven fabric with a slight sheen. Lined drawstring hood with a detachable faux fur trim, and a zip down the front with a chin guard. Fleece-lined handwarmer pockets, flap patch pockets and one inner pocket with a hook and loop fastener. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with hard-worn details. High waist and raw-edge, cut-off hems. The cotton content of the shorts is partly recycled.

Popover running jacket in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with reflective details. Stand-up collar, zip at the top, a partially loose yoke at the back and a chest pocket with a concealed zip. Seam at the waist, zipped side pockets, long sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a rounded hem with elastication at the back. Slightly longer at the back. Partly lined in mesh. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with adjustable shoulder straps and no fasteners.
Twisted metal hoop earrings. Diameter 3 cm.
Blouse in airy chiffon with a pleated collar, V-neck opening at the front with ties at the top, and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Lined.
Shorts in a soft cotton weave with elastication at the back of the waist and frills.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front and a round neckline with narrow ribbing.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with a jersey-lined hood. Deep V-neck with lacing at the front, low dropped shoulders and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs. Soft brushed inside.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and fastening at the back with two pairs of hooks and eyes.

Non-wired, V-neck body in lace and mesh with unlined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Adjustable shoulder straps and an adjustable strap across the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs, and cutaway coverage at the back.
Cropped top in lightweight, cotton sweatshirt fabric with embroidery and a text print on the front. Low dropped shoulders, long sleeves, ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a raw-edge hem.

Set with a T-shirt and pair of shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. T-shirt with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y) and sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.

Lightly padded parka in a sturdy weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood with imitation leather details and a stand-up collar. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, a chest pocket, two flap front pockets with press-studs, and inner ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Fully-fashioned hi-tops with an elastic shaft and mesh insoles.
Fine-knit jumper in soft cotton. Hood with a wrapover front and decorative drawstring, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Fine-knit trainer socks in a soft cotton blend with elasticated tops.
Classic T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and round neckline with a narrow trim.
Cotton twill shoes with lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Tube scarf in soft faux fur. Width 25 cm, circumference 70 cm.
Trainers in imitation leather with a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a small grosgrain loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Lace bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and lined gusset.
Trousers in soft corduroy with a high, elasticated waist, a fake welt pocket at the back and flared legs with sewn-in creases at the front.
Lined, strapless bandeau bikini top with decorative trims at the hem and cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. No fasteners.

Fully lined swimsuit with a deep neckline at the back and adjustable shoulder straps. Padded cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and extra-high-cut legs with cutaway coverage at the back.

Jacket in cotton denim with a collar, buttons down the front and a detachable tie belt at the waist. Open chest pockets, patch front pockets and a straight-cut hem. Unlined. The cotton content of the jacket is partly recycled.
Hooded top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a washed, worn look. Print motif on the front and sleeves, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Fitted top in ribbed jersey with a polo neck, long sleeves and double layer at the top with a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Hipster briefs in cotton jersey with an elasticated mid waist, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.
Fitted top in soft organic cotton jersey with short sleeves.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, wide elastic at the top and a high cut at the back.
Trousers in cotton-blend slub jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, slightly lower crotch, gently tapered legs, side pockets and ribbed hems. Regular fit.
Imitation leather sandals with a hook and loop fastener, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a hood and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.

Small shoulder bag in soft imitation leather with pleats, a short, chunky metal chain shoulder strap and a concealed zip at the top. Lining in woven fabric made from recycled polyester. Depth 7 cm. Height 16 cm. Width 28 cm.

Slim-fit suit trousers in twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, and zip fly with a button. Side pockets, fake back pockets with a button and legs with creases. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button and skinny legs.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with narrow piping in a contrasting colour. Relaxed fit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Ankle-length jeans in stretch denim with a high waist, zip fly and button, a coin pocket, back pockets and wide, straight legs. The cotton content of the jeans is partly recycled.

Set with a vest top and shorts. Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front. Shorts in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a ribbed drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and a print on one leg.
Top in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves, pockets in the side seams and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in airy, crinkled chiffon with a small, frilled collar that is gathered at the front. Opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Lined.
Jacket in a patterned weave with dropped shoulders and wide, 3/4-length sleeves. No fasteners.

Calf-length dress in taffeta made from recycled polyester with inset sections in lace. Round neckline, an opening with a covered button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with puffy draping at the shoulders for a dramatic silhouette. Gently flared, softly draping skirt and a concealed zip in one side.
Bikini briefs in mesh and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and cutaway coverage at the back.

Wide, long dress in a pattern-weave viscose with a collar, buttons at the top and long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs. Gathered seam at the waist and a wide flounce at the hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, pearly buttons at the front, flap front pockets and a gently tapered waist. Lined.
Ankle boots in imitation leather with pointed toes, covered heels and a zip in one side. Satin linings and imitation leather insoles. Heel 9.5 cm.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Push-up bra in microfibre with mesh and lace details and decorative straps at the front. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and narrow hems.
Imitation suede sandals with an ankle strap with an adjustable fastener and covered block heels. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lace blouse with short, flounce-trimmed sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.

Casual-style joggers in lightweight, washed cotton twill with decorative seams at the knees. Relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, ribbed, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and ribbed hems.
Hat in soft, rib-knit, warming cashmere with a wide turn-up at the hem.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit with inset lace sections at the back and wide lace trims at the cuffs.

Baby Exclusive. Two-piece set with a top and pair of leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder, long raglan sleeves and overlocked edges at the cuffs and hem. Leggings with soft elastication at the waist, and overlocked edges at the hems.
Longer-style shorts in soft cotton jersey with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, and patch leg pockets.
Pull-on trousers in cotton corduroy with elasticated ribbing at the waist and hems. Fake fly, side pockets and one back pocket. Jersey lining.
Treggings in sturdy cotton jersey with covered elastication at the waist, a fake fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
A pair of earrings in metal with a pearly plastic bead at the top and a hoop pendant.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbed side panels and a kangaroo pocket. Jersey-lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Brushed inside. Slim Fit.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric with flatlock seams, a jersey-lined drawstring hood and kangaroo pocket. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
V-neck blouse in a patterned weave with a collar, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Pull-on jeans in supersoft denim with a drawstring waist, and zip fly and press-stud. Side pockets, back pockets and slim legs with straight hems.
